Home » 40P23 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
32 Hīnattika, Kusalattika
Hīnattika, Kusalattika
41.
130Nahīnaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā majjhimo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
131Nahīnaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hīno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
132Nahīnaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
